DataElement.preferredDefinition: The date when the physical examination was performed represented in an unambiguous date format (e.g., DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: What was the date of the phys
ReferenceDocuments.description: What was the date of the physical examination?

ReferenceDocuments.name: Case Report Form
ReferenceDocuments.description: Record complete date of examination using this format (DD-MON-YYYY).

ReferenceDocuments.name: PEDTC
ReferenceDocuments.description: This does not map directly to an SDTMIG variable. For the SDTM submission dataset, concatenate all collected CDASH DATE and TIME components and populate the SDTMIG variable PEDTC in ISO 8601 format.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDASH Implementation Notes
ReferenceDocuments.description: The date of examination may be determined from the date of the visit (VISDAT) and if so, a separate assessment date field is not required.

ReferenceDocuments.name: CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Template Text
CDISC Aligned NCI Standard Equivalent CDE
ReferenceDocuments.description: This data element is to be used for CDISC aligned data collection in place of CDE 2004170 from the original NCI Standard CRF Template.
